title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 716.2 - Pertinent standards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 716.2 - Pertinent standards

State Regulations

Rehabilitation facilities shall comply with all pertinent
requirements, technical standards and codes set forth or incorporated by
reference into Part 711 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
716.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
